description: The Destroy Mode of the Banshee, which appears when its NT-D (Newtype Destroyer) system is activated, dramatically increasing its performance. The golden glow of its exposed psycho-frame shines from the gaps in its black armor, and it becomes a hunting machine that can carry out the original objective of the UC Project.
name: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 2 Gou Ki Banshee (Destroy Mode)
